title: Your Password Hash Is Mine!
description: I managed to steal a password hash from a website! Can you crack it for me: `steve:b3bd446fc33849ff7b454d5615f407fa70520fb3dde46893fea2292b5f8f1848`. Note, the flag is in the format `WMG{the_password}`.
author: Josh
hint: You can use `hashid` to identify what type the hash is.
